title: Senior Recruiter - Talent Acquisition Specialist
job_overview:
Job Title: Senior Recruiter - Talent Acquisition Specialist (Digital Marketing & Technical Roles)
Location: Philippines (Required) – Remote
Working Hours: Must be available for communication daily until at least 11:00 AM ET
Compensation: $8 – $12 USD per hour (based on experience and quality)
Employment Type: Independent Contractor, On-Demand
Start Date: Immediate
Expected Commitment: Near full-time availability during current high-demand phase, with flexibility to scale hours as hiring needs fluctuate
Duration: Long-term relationship

About JRA
Junk Removal Authority (JRA) is a US-based digital marketing agency specializing in websites, local SEO, and paid ad campaigns for the junk removal and waste management industry. Our team builds high-performance marketing sites, executes highly targeted SEO and Google Ads strategies, and delivers industry-specific expertise with a focus on measurable results.

Role Overview
We’re seeking a Philippines-based, proactive, detail-oriented contract recruiter to help us hire exceptional candidates across marketing, operations, and technical roles. The ideal candidate will be experienced in outbound recruiting, skilled at sourcing passive candidates, and able to assess both skillset and culture fit through structured interviews and AI-augmented evaluation methods.

This recruiter must also be capable of recording interviews and providing clear, concise summaries of candidate strengths, weaknesses, communication style, and fit for the role.

This is an on-demand role with current high activity, so we’re looking for someone ready to jump in and contribute immediately.

Key Responsibilities
Manage full-cycle recruiting: write job descriptions, source candidates, conduct screening interviews, and help with onboarding
Proactively reach out to candidates using LinkedIn, OnlineJobs.ph, job boards, and other platforms
Focus on outbound recruiting—identifying and attracting passive talent (including those already employed)
Record candidate interviews and submit summaries that outline key strengths and concerns
Coordinate hiring processes with team leads and leadership
Track applicants using spreadsheets, Asana, ClickUp, or similar systems
Use AI tools to enhance sourcing, evaluation, and communication workflows
Required Skills & Qualifications
Must be based in the Philippines
3+ years of experience recruiting in marketing, tech, or digital agency environments
Strong knowledge of digital marketing roles: SEO, Google Ads, WordPress, Account Management, etc.
Experience recruiting candidates in the Philippines, Latin America, and the United States
Proven success in outbound recruiting and engaging passive candidates
Excellent written and verbal English skills
Experience with tools like Asana, ClickUp, LinkedIn, and applicant tracking systems
Familiarity with using AI tools to extend recruiting capabilities (sourcing, screening, communication)
Highly organized and self-managed, with reliable follow-through
Ability to adapt to changing needs and manage multiple open roles concurrently
What We Offer
Flexible working hours (outside of daily check-ins before 11am ET)
Competitive hourly pay based on skill and performance
Long-term, stable contract with variable work volume depending on hiring needs
Opportunity to work with a growing U.S.-based digital agency in a high-impact recruiting role
How to Apply
To apply, please send:

Your resume
A brief summary of roles you’ve filled and the regions you’ve recruited in
Your hourly rate expectations
Your availability (including your earliest start date)
A detailed description of your outbound recruiting process, including:
Platforms you use
How you source passive candidates
Any AI tools or systems that help you work efficiently
???? Note: Applications without a clear explanation of outbound recruiting strategy will not be considered.
